articles.content:
Scientists point out that the genetic sequence of the novel coronavirus, which first struck Wuhan, China, was published only 260 days ago.

articles.title: Texas to receive 1.4 million doses of COVID-19 vaccine, governor says - KSAT San Antonio
articles.description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott said the state will receive more than 1.4 million doses of COVID-19 vaccines in December.
articles.content:
Texas Gov. Greg Abbott said the state will receive more than 1.4 million doses of COVID-19 vaccines in December.
